                                          # Druidæºç å­¦ä¹ 2DruidDataSourceçš„initè¿‡ç¨‹

                                          # 1. ç®€ä»‹

                                          DruidDataSourceçš„ä½¿ç”¨éƒ½æ˜¯åˆ›å»ºDruidDataSourceå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œseté…ç½®å‚æ•°ä¹‹åï¼Œè°ƒç”¨initæ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                                          # 2. init è¿‡ç¨‹

                                          # 2.1 double check

                                          1. åˆ¤æ–­initedçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ç¡®ä¿initæ–¹æ³•åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªDataSourceå¯¹è±¡ä¸­åªä¼šè¢«æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚ï¼ˆåé¢æœ‰åŠ é”ï¼‰ã€‚

                                          2. ä¹‹åå†…éƒ¨å¼€å¯è¦ç»™ReentrantLockã€‚è¿™ä¸ªlockè°ƒç”¨lockInterruptiblyã€‚ å¦‚æœè·å–ä¸åˆ°lock,åˆ™ä¼šå°†å½“å‰çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¼‘çœ ã€‚

                                          3. å†æ¬¡æ£€æµ‹initedçŠ¶æ€ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸ºtrue,åˆ™è¿”å›ã€‚è¿™é‡Œåšäº†ä¸€ä¸ªDoubleCheckã€‚

                                          4. å®šä¹‰initStackTrace ï¼Œä¸ºåç»­éœ€è¦getInitStackTraceæ–¹æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

                                          5. ç”ŸæˆDruidDataSourceçš„idã€‚è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªAtomicIntegerï¼Œä»1å¼€å§‹é€’å¢ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªDataSourceéƒ½ä¼šåŠ 1ã€‚

                                             /**
     * initæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ DruidDataSourceçš„å…¥å£ã€‚
     * @throws SQLException
     */
    public void init() throws SQLException {

        // 1. åŒå±‚æ ¡éªŒ
        // 1.1 åˆ¤æ–­initedçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ç¡®ä¿initæ–¹æ³•åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªDataSourceå¯¹è±¡ä¸­åªä¼šè¢«æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚ï¼ˆåé¢æœ‰åŠ é”ï¼‰ã€‚
        if (inited) {
            return;
        }

        // bug fixed for dead lock, for issue #2980
        DruidDriver.getInstance();

        //1.2  ä¹‹åå†…éƒ¨å¼€å¯è¦ç»™ReentrantLockã€‚è¿™ä¸ªlockè°ƒç”¨lockInterruptiblyã€‚ å¦‚æœè·å–ä¸åˆ°lock,åˆ™ä¼šå°†å½“å‰çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¼‘çœ 
        final ReentrantLock lock = this.lock;
        try {
            lock.lockInterruptibly();
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            throw new SQLException("interrupt", e);
        }

        //1.3 å†æ¬¡æ£€æµ‹initedçŠ¶æ€ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸ºtrue,åˆ™è¿”å›ã€‚è¿™é‡Œåšäº†ä¸€ä¸ªDoubleCheckã€‚
        boolean init = false;
        try {
            if (inited) {
                return;
            }

            // 1.4 å®šä¹‰initStackTrace ï¼Œä¸ºåç»­éœ€è¦getInitStackTraceæ–¹æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚
            initStackTrace = Utils.toString(Thread.currentThread().getStackTrace());

            // 1.5 ç”ŸæˆDruidDataSourceçš„idã€‚è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªAtomicIntegerï¼Œä»1å¼€å§‹é€’å¢ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªDataSourceéƒ½ä¼šåŠ 1ã€‚
            this.id = DruidDriver.createDataSourceId();
            
            ....
         }

                                          # 2.2 åˆå§‹åŒ–

                                          # 2.2.1 åˆå§‹åŒ–1

                                          1. åˆå§‹åŒ–jdbcUrlã€‚trimå¤„ç†ã€‚

                                          2. åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„Filterå¤„ç†ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¼šå¢åŠ è¦ç»™StatFilterã€‚

                                          3. æ ¹æ®dbType,è¿›è¡ŒcacheServerConfigurationçš„ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ã€‚éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®åº“éœ€è¦å°†è¿™ä¸ªå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®ä¸ºfalseã€‚

                                          4. å¯¹maxActiveã€minIdleã€timeBetweenLogStatsMillisã€maxEvictableIdleTimeMillisã€keepAliveã€keepAliveBetweenTimeMillisç­‰å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ ¡éªŒã€‚

                                           // 2. åˆå§‹åŒ–
            // 2.1 åˆå§‹åŒ–jdbcUrlã€‚trimå¤„ç†ã€‚
            if (this.jdbcUrl != null) {
                this.jdbcUrl = this.jdbcUrl.trim();
                initFromWrapDriverUrl();
            }

            // 2.2 åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„Filterå¤„ç†ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¼šå¢åŠ è¦ç»™StatFilterã€‚
            for (Filter filter : filters) {
                filter.init(this);
            }

            // 2.3 æ ¹æ®dbType,è¿›è¡ŒcacheServerConfigurationçš„ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ã€‚éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®åº“éœ€è¦å°†è¿™ä¸ªå‚æ•°è®¾ç½®ä¸ºfalseã€‚
            if (this.dbTypeName == null || this.dbTypeName.length() == 0) {
                this.dbTypeName = JdbcUtils.getDbType(jdbcUrl, null);
            }

            DbType dbType = DbType.of(this.dbTypeName);
            if (dbType == DbType.mysql
                    || dbType == DbType.mariadb
                    || dbType == DbType.oceanbase
                    || dbType == DbType.ads) {
                boolean cacheServerConfigurationSet = false;
                if (this.connectProperties.containsKey("cacheServerConfiguration")) {
                    cacheServerConfigurationSet = true;
                } else if (this.jdbcUrl.indexOf("cacheServerConfiguration") != -1) {
                    cacheServerConfigurationSet = true;
                }
                if (cacheServerConfigurationSet) {
                    this.connectProperties.put("cacheServerConfiguration", "true");
                }
            }

            // 2.4 å¯¹maxActiveã€minIdleã€timeBetweenLogStatsMillisã€maxEvictableIdleTimeMillisã€keepAliveã€keepAliveBetweenTimeMillisç­‰å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ ¡éªŒã€‚
            if (maxActive <= 0) {
                throw new IllegalArgumentException("illegal maxActive " + maxActive);
            }

            if (maxActive < minIdle) {
                throw new IllegalArgumentException("illegal maxActive " + maxActive);
            }

resolveDriver();

// 2.7 åˆå§‹åŒ–æ ¡éªŒ
initCheck();

// 2.11 ä¹‹åï¼ŒdataSourceStatæ˜¯å¦é‡‡ç”¨äº†Globalã€‚å¯¹dataSourceStatè¿›è¡Œsetã€‚
//
if (isUseGlobalDataSourceStat()) {
    dataSourceStat = JdbcDataSourceStat.getGlobal();
    if (dataSourceStat == null) {
        dataSourceStat = new JdbcDataSourceStat("Global", "Global", this.dbTypeName);
        JdbcDataSourceStat.setGlobal(dataSourceStat);
    }
    if (dataSourceStat.getDbType() == null) {
        dataSourceStat.setDbType(this.dbTypeName);
    }
} else {
    dataSourceStat = new JdbcDataSourceStat(this.name, this.jdbcUrl, this.dbTypeName, this.connectProperties);
}
dataSourceStat.setResetStatEnable(this.resetStatEnable);

// 2.12 åˆå§‹åŒ–holderçš„æ•°ç»„ï¼š
connections = new DruidConnectionHolder[maxActive];
evictConnections = new DruidConnectionHolder[maxActive];

                                          # 2.3 åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥

            // 3.1 åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿›è¡Œå¼‚æ­¥åˆå§‹åŒ–
            if (createScheduler != null && asyncInit) {
                // 3.2 å¦‚æœå¼‚æ­¥åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨é€šè¿‡submitCreateTaskè¿›è¡Œã€‚
                for (int i = 0; i < initialSize; ++i) {
                    submitCreateTask(true);

            } else if (!asyncInit) {

                // 3.3 å¦‚æœpoolingCount < initialSizeï¼Œåˆ™åˆ›å»ºç‰©ç†è¿æ¥ã€‚
                // 3.3.1 å¦‚æœinitialSizeä¸é…ç½®ä¸º0ï¼Œåœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ä¸ä¼šè¢«è§¦å‘ï¼Œè¿™æ ·åªæœ‰çœŸæ­£éœ€è¦Connectionçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ‰ä¼šå»åˆ›å»ºç‰©ç†çš„è¿æ¥ã€‚

                while (poolingCount < initialSize) {
                    try {
//                        åœ¨åŒæ­¥åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ¡ä»¶ä¸‹ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–æ“ä½œå°†é€šè¿‡initçº¿ç¨‹è¿›è¡Œã€‚è€Œåç»­ç”±äºè¿æ¥æ± ä½¿ç”¨è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­åŠ¨æ€çš„æ”¶ç¼©å’Œæ‰©å±•ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯ç”±å…¶ä»–å•ç‹¬çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚

            }

                                          # 2.4 åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹

               submitCreateTask(true);

                                          # 2.5 finallyå¤„ç†

                                          finallyå¤„ç†é€»è¾‘ï¼š ä¿®æ”¹initedä¸ºtrue,å¹¶è§£é”ã€‚

                                           finally {
            // 5 finallyå¤„ç†
            // 5.1 ä¿®æ”¹initedä¸ºtrue,å¹¶è§£é”ã€‚
            inited = true;

            // 5.2 åˆ¤æ–­initå’Œæ—¥å¿—çš„INFOçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæ‰“å°ä¸€æ¡initå®Œæˆçš„æ—¥å¿—ã€‚
            if (init && LOG.isInfoEnabled()) {

                if (this.name != null && !this.name.isEmpty()) {
                    msg += ",";
                    msg += this.name;
                }

                msg += "} inited";

                LOG.info(msg);
            }
        }
